doc.title: Besat af arbejde
doc.plot: Stress is becoming a common phenomenom and affects more and more people. On his holiday in France the IBM managing director Lars Rath suddenly collapsed. He had been working 80 hours a week for years with only 3-4 hours of daily sleep. The 36 year-old Bjarne Schøn, an executive at the computer company Navision, is married and have two kids. Still he works 70-80 hours a week. Sometimes his wife Rikke worry about his working schedule. Can his body take this kind of load?
